data.name: Good Fortune
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

GOOD FORTUNE is the rags-to-riches tale of "conscious capitalism" pioneer John Paul DeJoria, who, born with nothing and at times homeless on the streets of L.A., rose to become an international business mogul, cofounding the iconic brands Paul Mitchell hair prodcuts and Patrón Teuila. A modern-day Robin Hood, JP's motto is "Success unshared is failure." The son of immigrants, JP defies the stereotype of "the 1%" and is the poster boy of the triple bottom line: people, planet, and profit.
data.about_the_game: GOOD FORTUNE is the rags-to-riches tale of "conscious capitalism" pioneer John Paul DeJoria, who, born with nothing and at times homeless on the streets of L.A., rose to become an international business mogul, cofounding the iconic brands Paul Mitchell hair prodcuts and Patrón Teuila. A modern-day Robin Hood, JP's motto is "Success unshared is failure." The son of immigrants, JP defies the stereotype of "the 1%" and is the poster boy of the triple bottom line: people, planet, and profit.
data.short_description: The inspiring true life story of billionaire and philanthropist John Paul DeJoria, the successful entrepreneur who cofounded Paul Mitchell hair products and Patrón Tequila.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: Intel Core 2 или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 5 Мбит/с для 540p, 3 Мбит/с для 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10
  • Процессор: Для воспроизведения HD 1080p рекомендуется процессор Intel Core i3+ или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 12 Мбит/с для 1080p или 8 Мбит/с для 720p.
